briefTitle: COVID-19 Pandemic: Effect on Management of Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: COVID 19 Pandemic: Effect on Management of Patients With Breast Cancer; Single Center Study
conditions: Covid19, Breast Cancer Stage, Isolation, Social, Locally Advanced Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Duration of delay in presentation to hospital
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* diagnosis of breast cancer confirmed on histo-pathological examination

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who had already had their surgery pre covid (December 2019)
